[[1993â94 Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu season|1993â94]] |} [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] (MÄ°Y) participated in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] [[1992â93 Turkish Second Football League|1992-93]] season for the 19th time. Starting from this year the league has been played in two stages. MÄ°Y started league with championship claim but couldn't promote. The team also participated in [[Turkish Cup]] (''TÃ¼rkiye KupasÄ±'') in [[1992â93 Turkish Cup|1992â93]] and eliminated at Round 1. ==1992â93 league participation== [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] took place in Group 3 in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] [[1992â93 Turkish Second Football League|1992â93]] season. League had been played in two stages. In the first stage 55 teams in five groups (three with 11 teams, two with 10 teams) fiÅghted for top two places. Top two teams of ranking groups (10 teams) had consisted promotion group. At the end of the second stage top three teams of promotion group promoted to [[Turkish First Football League|First League]] [[1993â94 Turkish First Football League|1993â94]]. Remaining teams in each ranking group played in relegation groups. Bottom three teams relegated to [[Turkish Third Football League|Third League]] [[1993â94 Turkish Third Football League|1993â94]] at the end of the season[http://www.angelfire.com/nj/sivritepe/9293/CP2L.html Cem Pekin Archives] 5 February 2010.. [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] took place in Group 3 consisted of 10 teams and finished first stage at second place. In promotion group team finished 5th and couldn't promote. Head coach [[Kadri AytaÃ§]] resigned before the season finished, and was replaced by [[NasÄ±r Belci]] for the remaining four matches. ===Ranking group performance=== Mersin Ä°Y's league performance in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] Group 3 in [[1992â93 Turkish Second Football League|1992â93]] season is shown in the following tableStandings and results from [http://www.tff.org/Default.aspx?pageID=809&grupID=337#grp TFF second league page]. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !rowspan=2|place !rowspan=2|team !colspan=4|games !colspan=2|goals !rowspan=2|points !rowspan=2| !colspan=3|home !rowspan=2| !colspan=3|away |- !
